Facades 2.0
changes.details:
â€¢ Timeline: Explore the history and grand opening of any store.
â€¢ Visit receipts: Track multiple store visits and share custom visit receipts.
â€¢ Custom lists: Create and share store lists that sync with iCloud.
â€¢ Search filters: Build advanced search filters on the main store list.
â€¢ Shortcuts: Find nearby stores and search with the Action button on iPhone 15 Pro.
â€¢ Updated design with an all-new Browse tab and Split View layout on iPad.
â€¢ Learn about store features in the Glossary.
â€¢ Choose a home store and home region for quick access in the Browse tab.
â€¢ Share an image with store details from any store page.
â€¢ Share a summary of your store visits and export a CSV list.
â€¢ View any store list on a map.
â€¢ Global Map includes realistic elevation and satellite views.
â€¢ View supported stores in Maps Look Around.
